attributes.action: Time To End Poverty Around The World
attributes.additional_details:
25,000 People die every day because they do not have enough food to eat.
Its ridiculous.
We can stop it, in a second.
We are valuing money over peoples lives.
I propose that we take 20% of what business pay as tax and give it to Charitys that end can end poverty. You may say that is too much. But can you really put a price on peoples lives.
If you take 20% of Buisness taxes. That will be donating £10,000,000,000 A YEAR. We can abolish poverty in a instance.
